column.name: sc_chi2prob

column.description: Spatial extension of the source in the hard energy band. (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: ext_b7_err
column.description: Statistical one sigma error on the hard band extension parameter. (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: ext_b8
column.description: Spatial extension of the source in the total energy band. (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: ext_b8_err
column.description: Statistical one sigma error on the total band extension parameter. (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: ext_ml_b6
column.description: Likelihood of the source being extended in the soft (0.2-2 keV) energy band

column.name: ext_ml_b7
column.description: Likelihood of the source being extended in the hard (2-12 keV) energy band

column.name: ext_ml_b8
column.description: Likelihood of the source being extended in the total (0.2-12 keV) energy band.

column.name: filt_cnts
column.description: The number of counts found within a 1 arcminute radius about the source position after standard filtering is applied.

column.name: flag_comment
column.description: A comment which explains why a particular source flag has been set to true

column.name: flux_b6
column.description: The source flux in the total energy (0.2-2.0 keV)

column.name: flux_b6_err
column.description: The error on the soft band source flux

column.name: flux_b7
column.description: The source flux in the hard energy (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: flux_b7_err
column.description: The error on the hard band source flux

column.name: flux_b8
column.description: The source flux in the total energy (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: flux_b8_err
column.description: The error on the total band source flux.

column.name: hr1
column.description: The hardness ratio, defined as HR1 = (rate_b7-rate_b6)/(rate_b7+rate_b6) where rate_b7 is the hard band count rate and rate_b6 is the soft band count rate. This has been calculated for the 1936 sources which have a positive detection in both bands

column.name: hr1_err
column.description: Error on the hardness ratio calculated as: sqrt(rate_b7_err*rate_b7_err + rate_b6_err*rate_b6_err) /(rate_b7+rate_b6) where rate_b7_err and rate_b6_err are the errors on the hard and soft band count rates respectively

column.name: id_category
column.description: The source type as returned by SIMBAD, NED and the other resources used in the cross-matching process.

column.name: id_dist
column.description: The distance in arcminutes between the best match candidate and the SLEW survey source

column.name: ident
column.description: Cross-correlations of the positions of the slew sources with astronomical databases and catalogues have been performed (see section on IDs)

column.name: id_resource
column.description: The astronomical database or catalogue from which the best match has been selected.

column.name: image_bg_rate
column.description: Peak background count rate in the image from which the source was extracted

column.name: lii
column.description: Galactic Longitude [degrees]

column.name: lii_b6
column.description: The galactic position in [degrees] of the soft band source. (0.2-2.0 keV)

column.name: lii_b7
column.description: The galactic position in [degrees] of the hard band source. (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: lii_b8
column.description: The galactic position in [degrees] of the total band source. (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: mjd_start
column.description: Modified Julian Date (i.e., JD - 2400000.5) of the start of the observation.

column.name: mjd_stop
column.description: Modified Julian Date (i.e., JD - 2400000.5) of the end of the observation.

column.name: mode_id
column.description: Observing mode of the EPIC-pn camera. FF= Full frame mode eFF = extended full frame mode LW = large window mode

column.name: ra
column.description: Right Ascension [degrees]

column.name: ra_b6
column.description: The J2000 celestial position of the soft band source. (0.2-2.0 keV)

column.name: ra_b7
column.description: The J2000 celestial position of the hard band source. (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: ra_b8
column.description: The J2000 celestial position of the total band source. (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: radec_b6_err
column.description: The statistical error in [degrees], on the soft band position. (0.2-2.0 keV)

column.name: radec_b7_err
column.description: The statistical error in [degrees], on the hard band position. (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: radec_b8_err
column.description: The statistical error in [degrees], on the total band position. (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: radec_err
column.description: Radial error on the position, computed as sqrt(ra_err2 + dec_err2), in arcsecs, where ra_err and dec_err are the 1 sigma uncertainties in the RA and DEC coordinates respectively.

column.name: rass_dist
column.description: The distance from the best match ROSAT source and the SLEW source

column.name: rate_b6
column.description: The soft band count rate (0.2-2.0 keV)

column.name: rate_b6_err
column.description: The error on the soft band count rate (0.2-2.0 keV)

column.name: rate_b7
column.description: The hard band count rate (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: rate_b7_err
column.description: The error on the hard band count rate (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: rate_b8
column.description: The total band count rate (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: rate_b8_err
column.description: The error on the total band count rate (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: scts_b6
column.description: The number of background subtracted counts, in the soft energy band (0.2-2 keV), corrected for the PSF

column.name: scts_b6_err
column.description: Statistical 1 sigma error on the soft band source counts (0.2-2.0 keV).

column.name: scts_b7
column.description: The number of background subtracted counts, in the hard energy band (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: scts_b7_err
column.description: Statistical 1 sigma error on the hard band source counts (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: scts_b8
column.description: The number of background subtracted counts, in the total energy band (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: scts_b8_err
column.description: Statistical 1 sigma error on the total band source counts (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: slew_observation_id
column.description: SLEW observation ID

column.name: srcname
column.description: This is the official name for sources detected in the XMM-Newton slew survey

column.name: srcname_b6
column.description: The source name defined in the soft band list. The format is 'xs' followed by the revolution number, the observation ID and the source position, e.g. xs0841_9084100002_12:57:07.5+01:50:42

column.name: srcname_b7
column.description: The source name defined in the hard band list. The format is 'xs' followed by the revolution number, the observation ID and the source position, e.g. xs0841_9084100002_12:57:07.5+01:50:42

column.name: srcname_b8
column.description: The source name defined in the total band list. The format is 'xs' followed by the revolution number, the observation ID and the source position, e.g. xs0841_9084100002_12:57:07.5+01:50:42

column.name: srcnum
column.description: This is the official name for sources detected in the XMM-Newton slew survey

column.name: unfilt_cnts
column.description: The number of counts found within a 1 arcminute radius about the source position with no filtering applied

column.name: us_extras
column.description: Name in the EXTRAS catalogue

column.name: us_xmmsl1
column.description: XMMSL1 name

column.name: ver_false
column.description: This is a catch-all for problems not included in the other flags.

column.name: ver_halo
column.description: If set true, this flag indicates that a detection lies within the point spread function, or halo, of a very bright source and is probably spurious.

column.name: ver_hibgnd
column.description: If set true, this flag indicates that the source lies within a bright region, caused by high background, and is probably spurious.

column.name: ver_inext
column.description: If set true, this flag notes that a detection has been found within an extended source and is probably false. This flag is used to ensure that only one source is quoted for the large supernova remnants.

column.name: ver_nredg
column.description: Source near edge. Not used in XMMSL2.

column.name: ver_optload
column.description: A warning flag indicating that the source may suffer from optical loading

column.name: ver_psusp
column.description: This flag indicates that the quoted position of the source is likely to be inaccurate. In a few slews the attitude reconstruction is poor and in these cases the actual position of the source is difficult to determine and can be wrong by an arcminute.

column.name: x_ima_b6
column.description: The X position of the source in the soft band image in image pixels. (0.2-2.0 keV)

column.name: x_ima_b7
column.description: The X position of the source in the hard band image in image pixels. (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: x_ima_b8
column.description: The X position of the source in the total band image in image pixels. (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: ximname_b6
column.description: The name of the image containing the soft band detection. (0.2-2.0 keV)

column.name: ximname_b7
column.description: The name of the image containing the hard band detection. (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: ximname_b8
column.description: The name of the image containing the total band detection. (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: y_ima_b6
column.description: The Y position of the source in the soft band image in image pixels. (0.2-2.0 keV)

column.name: y_ima_b7
column.description: The Y position of the source in the hard band image in image pixels. (2.0-12.0 keV)

column.name: y_ima_b8
column.description: The Y position of the source in the total band image in image pixels. (0.2-12.0 keV)

column.name: heasarc_code
column.description: HEASARC Object Classification
